project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement feature to load CSV file and handle errors
Implement feature to allow user to select numerical columns for analysis
Implement feature to calculate mean for the selected columns
Implement feature to calculate median for the selected columns
Implement feature to calculate mode for the selected columns
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
